entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • You must install or update .NET to run this application repeatedly error returns after repair steps . #38999

Closed

  • `dotnet list package --vulnerable` should return non-zero exit code when vulnerabilities found #38994

PullRequests

Created

  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Discussion: Prototype for `dotnet tool update --all` #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Updated

  • Use `Convert.ToHexStringLower` #38965
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Select the first TFM when `run`ning a multi-targeted application #38995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add devcontainer support #37412
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Use an infinite timeout for HttpClient operations for Container Registry interactions #38938
